SEARCH
Package Game.Mission

Class Graph<T>

java.lang.Object
Game.Mission.Graph<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The type representing the vertices in the graph.
All Implemented Interfaces:
GraphADT<T>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Map
public class Graph<T> extends Object implements GraphADT<T>
Represents a graph data structure using an adjacency matrix implementation. The graph stores vertices and their connections and supports basic operations such as adding/removing vertices and edges, as well as traversing the graph using BFS (Breadth-First Search) and DFS (Depth-First Search).
Author:
Tânia Morais, Tomás Neto
